title: [bug][2.0.0-beta] DevTools cannot be toggled by keyboard shortcut

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

I noticed from upgrading 2.0.0-alpha to 2.0.0-beta that the DevTools cannot be toggled by <kbd>CTRL</kbd> + <kbd>SHIFT</kbd> + <kbd>i</kbd> anymore, like it is documented in https://beta.tauri.app/guides/debug/application/#webview-console

When opening the DevTools by context menu "Inspect element" I can spot this error message:
`Unhandled Promise Rejection: window.internal_toggle_devtools not allowed. Permissions associated with this command: `

It seems there isn't a permission associated that could be configured in [ACL/Capabilities](https://beta.tauri.app/references/v2/acl/#capabilities) and setting the only cap that made sense to me `webview:allow-internal-toggle-devtools` did not work.

### Reproduction

In debug build press the keyboard shortcut (on Linux: <kbd>CTRL</kbd> + <kbd>SHIFT</kbd> + <kbd>i</kbd>) on the webview . Nothing happens. Then open the DevTools using "Inspect element" and note the mentioned error message.

### Expected behavior

Should toggle the DevTools as documented.

### Additional context
